name: Insert Coin (Midrax, thanik, firepro20)
description:
"Insert Coin" is an odd trip in the history of early videogames, remade (or remastered, as some people would say today) using Unreal Engine 4. 

From Pong to Space Invaders and more, with elements resembling features from other famous titles that have become part of our modern day pop culture, "Insert Coin" is going to make you crave for old-school games.

Get ready to press START!

Gameplay Instructions
Keyboard: WASD/Arrow keys to move, SPACE/Left click to fire, Esc to exit game
Gamepad: Left Thumbstick to move, South/East button to fire
